Description: Ichigo Kurosaki sees dead people and must help usher them safely into the afterlife.
Title: BLEACH, VOL. 27
Author: Tite Kubo

Description: This is a manga adaptation of the best selling children’s series about ordinary housecats trying to fulfill extraordinary destinies.
Title: WARRIROS: TIGERSTAR AND SASHA, VOL. 3
Author: Erin Hunter and Don Hudson
Contributor: by Erin Hunter and Don Hudson

Description: Tsukune Aono’s new school is filled with vampires and werewolves. How is a human teenager to survive?
Title: ROSARIO   VAMPIRE 7
Author: Akihisa Ikeda

Description: Naruto’s former teammate, Sasuke, learns vital details about his family’s past.
Title: NARUTO, VOL. 43
Author: Masashi Kishimoto

Description: The secret history of Sasuke''s family continues to be revealed.
Title: NARUTO, VOL. 44
Author: Masashi Kishimoto

Description: Haruhi, a poor girl at a rich school, is forced to work – as a boy – for the school’s all-male club. The series is described as a “romantic comedy.”
Title: OURAN HIGH SCHOOLHOST CLUB, VOL. 12
Author: Bisco Hatori

Description: Naruto’s teacher Jiraiya must delve deep into the past to uncover the secret of Pain’s origin.
Title: NARUTO, VOL. 42
Author: Masashi Kishimoto

Description: Tenth grader Yugi, a fan of puzzles, becomes possessed by the King of Games. Now the mystic Shadi comes to challenge him — and lives hang in the balance.
Title: YU-GI-OH!, VOL. 3
Author: Kazuki Takahashi and Naoyuki Kageyama
Contributor: by Kazuki Takahashi and Naoyuki Kageyama

Description: Two brothers harmed in a ritual that was half magic/half science seek the legendary Philosopher’s Stone to make things right.
Title: FULLMETAL ALCHEMIST 18
Author: Hiromu Arakawa

Description: Monkey D. Luffy, who has the power to stretch like rubber, and a motley crew of would-be pirates join forces to search for a legendary treasure called “One Piece.”
Title: ONE PIECE 21
Author: Eiichiro Oda
